metadata.title: CVE-2022-2712 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse GlassFish versions 5.1.0 to 6.2.5, there is a vulnerability inrelative path traversal because it does not filter request path startingwith './'. Successful exploitation could allow an remote unauthenticatedattacker to access critical data, such as configuration files and deployedapplication source code.

criterions.comment: glassfish package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
